remarks: Theorem *3.11 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 111, but for decidable propositions.  The converse, ~ pm3.1 , holds for all propositions, not just decidable ones.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 22-Apr-2018.)
statement: pm3.11dc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( DECID ps -> ( -. ( -. ph \/ -. ps ) -> ( ph /\ ps ) ) ) ) $.
